Company Description

In the world of energy, no area is more exciting than large-scale energy storage. From a few installations a decade ago to a market Barclays Bank says is “likely to approach the trillions,” energy storage makes wind and solar available around the clock. Invinity is taking a leading role by providing a safe, reliable, and economical alternative to conventional storage solutions.

About Us: Invinity Energy Systems (LON: IES)

Invinity Energy Systems is the leading global manufacturer of modular vanadium flow batteries for utility-scale energy storage deployments that unlock low-cost, low-carbon renewable energy on demand for businesses, industry and electricity networks around the world. Safe, reliable, durable and economical, Invinity’s flow batteries are the most commercially proven alternative to lithium-ion and help to accelerate global progress towards Net Zero. We have commercial projects in Europe, North America, Asia and Australia, with office location in Vancouver, BC and Bathgate, Scotland, London, UK and San Francisco, California.

Summary

Job Description

Invinity is looking to add a Software Engineer to join our Software Team. In this role you will be contributing to our major projects while helping diagnose, maintain, implement, test, and support the software of our battery systems in the field.

Duties And Responsibilities

Lead and/or participate in design, development, and implementation of software projects
Maintain, improve, and add features to Invinity's battery software system
Investigate technical support issues and provide resolution recommendations and implementations
Provide leadership and ownership for major facets of Invinity software technical support investigations

Qualifications

A Bachelors or Master’s degree in Software Engineering
2+ years Software Development experience
Strong LabVIEW development skills
Experience with communication protocols such as CAN and Modbus
Some experience with Python
Self-starter, who is not afraid to dig into problems
Experience working in interdisciplinary development teams

Additional Information

Is helping the world transition to renewable energy exciting to you? Join us! Come and be part of a dynamic, global company where the team works with passion but not ego.
